meanings.definition: The scale of objects that are measured in nanometers.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study materials at the nanoscale to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent2: The nanoscale is crucial in the field of nanotechnology.
meanings.sent3: At the nanoscale, tiny particles behave in mysterious ways.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the nanoscale is like entering a miniature world full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The nanoscale reveals hidden details invisible to the naked eye.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the scale of objects that are measured in nanometers.
meanings.sent1: The nanoscale materials exhibit unique properties due to their size.
meanings.sent2: Nanoscale technology has revolutionized various industries.
meanings.sent3: Wearing my nanoscale glasses, everything looked incredibly small!
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, our planet seems like a nanoscale speck.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beauty of nature at the nanoscale in his painting.
